item.title: Next-Level Classroom Automation: Gemini CLI, Google Classroom, and MCP
item.description: Gists Abstract Automate Google Classroom management with natural language. This guide details using the Gemini CLI and an MCP server to streamline creating classes, managing assignments, and interacting with students. Introduction Unlock the power of natural language to command your Google Workspace. I’ve recently demonstrated how you can automate Google Workspace applications using simple, conversational commands through the Gemini CLI and the MCP (Model Context Protocol) server.
